column2: Performance And Integration Of Smartphone Wireless Ecg Monitoring Into The Enterprise Electronic Health Record: First Clinical Experience
column3: Patient initiated, remote cardiac monitoring has proved to be a significant advance in the diagnosis and management of arrhythmias. Further improvements in ease of use and access to results will further improve health outcomes and cost-effectiveness. Here we describe a proof-of-concept evaluation to assess the feasibility of successfully implementing a cloud-based management system using KardiaPro (KP) for remote electrocardiogram (ECG) monitoring to interface into EPIC, an enterprise electronic health record (EHR) system.
column5: Cho GW, Almeida SO, Gang ES, Elad Y, Duncan R, Budoff MJ, Karlsberg RP
column22: Remote monitoring, atrial fibrillation, wearables, ventricular tachycardia, electrocardiogram, AliveCor, KardiaPro, KardiaMobile, smartphone EKG, Kardia
